meta.title: What's new in Vert.x 4.3
meta.summary: See an overview of all new and exciting features in Vert.x 4.3, including Web Client URL templates, JSON schema improvements, more compression algorithms, dynamic codec lookup, and more.

meta.title: Eclipse Vert.x 4.3.0 released!
meta.summary: Eclipse Vert.x version 4.3.0 has just been released. It comes with a set of new exciting features!

meta.title: Eclipse Vert.x 4.2.7 released!
